sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access/> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.VMwareActivityBase</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description>Base activity for VMware activities - its purpose is to set the required capability</description> <name>VMwareActivityBase</name> <script><![CDATA[workflow.includeActivityDefinition('Run Probe');
var VMwareActivityBase = Class.create(); VMwareActivityBase.prototype = Object.extendsObject(Run_ProbeActivityHandler, {
initialize: function() { Run_ProbeActivityHandler.prototype.initialize.call(this); },
configureRequiredCapabilities: function() { this._addRequiredCapability("vmware"); },
type: 'VMwareActivityBase' });]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>jimmy.yuan</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2012-09-22 20:17:35</sys_created_on> <sys_id>08ef6c43372030006b882d465abe5d1d</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>VMwareActivityBase</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Orchestration - Runtime" source="com.snc.runbook_automation.runtime">f3d67d412f140110d8a4d5f62799b6d1</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_08ef6c43372030006b882d465abe5d1d</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>jimmy.yuan</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2012-09-22 20:29:15</sys_updated_on> <u_script_length>412</u_script_length> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
